name: Constellation Pinball
description:
Best played with two people, but it works as a one player experience as well :) 

Relax and enjoy this glowy, dreamy, atmospheric  pinball where the only points that matter are the constellations you create. Hit the glowing yellow stars to create star connections and create beautiful constellations that leap into the sky. Don't worry - there's no game over, so try as much as you need to light up the night. 

Use X + Z for pink paddles, Left + Right arrows for blue paddles. 

Solo project made in two weeks.

Music by Jonny Easton - "Aurora" (here)

Ultimate Gem Pack assets by Aurunsky

Flipper 3D Model by Andrvalg

Raw SFX from soundsnap.com
